title: Support LOM-MAPI-oPOM (O3)-EOS integration part I
description:
Description
Basic Integration into MAPIs:
Build up MAPI decomposer with integration to:
acceptance_criteria:
Basic Integration into MAPIs delivered by O3:
O3-MAPI decomposer with integration to:
Product Catalog M-API
Product Offering Qualification M-API
Geographic Address M-API into O3
Party (CGE) M-API
has been implemented
M-API order to EOS can be provided by O3
Enriched M-API order from EOS can be received by O3
A O3 generated M-API order can be delivered to Product Ordering M-API

O3-MAPI decomposer with integration to:
Product Catalog M-API
Product Offering Qualification M-API
Geographic Address M-API into O3
Party (CGE) M-API
has been implemented
M-API order to EOS can be provided by O3
Enriched M-API order from EOS can be received by O3
A O3 generated M-API order can be delivered to Product Ordering M-API

O3 can create Product Orders against Frame Agreements:
Frame agreement information can be read by O3
Product orders against existing frame agreements can be created by O3
Frame agreement information can be read by O3
Product orders against existing frame agreements can be created by O3
